entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PAX Tar timestamps from extended attributes parsing may not be a `double`, but `long.long` #70801
    7.0.0
  • Repo requires .NET 7 Preview 5 #70799
    7.0.0
  • Corrupted output writing large array to an AnonymousPipeServerStream on linux using netcoreapp3.1 #70798
  • .NET 6: JsonContent.Create(obj) should set Content-Length HTTP request header #70793
  • Test failure: Interop\\IJW\\CopyConstructorMarshaler\\CopyConstructorMarshaler\\CopyConstructorMarshaler.cmd #70791
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'assertion->op2.u1.iconFlags != GTF_EMPTY' #70790
    7.0.0
  • x86: Assertion failed '!"Too many unreachable block removal loops"' during 'Global local var liveness' #70786
    8.0.0
  • JsonNode? control = JsonNode.Parse(json) => System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #70785
  • [ICU] Tracking issue for all culture, language and translation problems #70781
  • System.Private.CoreLib.dll not found in .NET 7 Preview 5 #70776
    7.0.0
  • .NET 5 regression in Math.Min behaviour with NaNs #70775
    6.0.x
  • [Wasm][AOT] Profiled AOT compilation fails with Segmentation fault #70773
    7.0.0
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\diagnosticport\\diagnosticport\\diagnosticport.cmd #70766
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for build/bundler changes #70762
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.BigIntegerConstructorTest.RunCtorSingleTests #70761

Closed

  • Unsupported features to Cross Compile to linux-arm64 on wsl and also osx #70250
  • Collectible AssemblyLoadContext is collected by GC while type from it is still alive #68434
  • .NET 6 crashes on a macOS 12.x virtual machine on Apple Silicon (arm64) #64103
  • When an assembly load fails, include detailed error information in the exception #63233
  • Inconsistent behaviour with fr-CA CultureInfo across platforms #70789
  • [wasm] Reduce amount of exception filtering in code reached from Blazor template #50281
    7.0.0
  • Loading Native Images for corresponding assemblies from custom cache transparently #60250
  • ReadyToRun app fails if custom attributes have types with utf8 characters #63481
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_StapledOcsp(offlineContext: False) #70322
    7.0.0
  • win-arm64 NativeAOT CI job frequently times out in PRs #70549
    7.0.0
  • Enterprise authentication tests are failing with PlatformNotSupportedException #68366
    7.0.0
  • BeginGetHostAddresses returns unexpected results when using systemd-resolved #33145
    Future
  • Release tag 3.1.26 #70774
  • Core 6.0 HttpClient throwing timeout exception #70691
  • [wasm][aot] Exception Handling Improvements #63399
    7.0.0
  • Inconsistent results working with Tasks in AOT-Published Blazor.WebAssembly builds #70286
  • codesign fails on osx-arm64 binary #70780
  • Race condition results in Assembly reference equality being false #70742
    7.0.0
  • Huge performance regression during JIT code generation with ILGenerator on .NET 6.0 (Windows x64) #68953
    6.0.x
  • Test `CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback` is failing on Android #70469
    7.0.0
  • Issues with hot reloading html changes from a Razor file when @bind is used in Blazor WASM .NET 6 Preview 3 #51855
    7.0.0
  • `JIT\HardwareIntrinsics\General\Vector256` test crashes with an `SEHException` on a machine without AVX2 #70663
    7.0.0
  • JsonConverter from unused JsonSerializerOptions throws for missing metadata #70732
  • [wasm] Unify BuildWinWasmRuntimes and BuildWasmRuntimes targets #51553
    7.0.0
  • Blazor Hot Reload: MatBlazor Button breaks Hot reload in Dotnet 6 preview 3. #51126
    7.0.0
  • Exception in MsQuicStream.HandleWriteStartState can abandon CancellationTokenRegistration #55437
    7.0.0
  • VN does not number some HWI loads properly #63499
    7.0.0
  • how can I add project reference output to sub folder #63036
  • After upgrade .net core from 3.0 to 6.0, System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10060) randomly shows up #69296
    Future
  • `impNormStructVal` should not retype nodes that cannot be retyped #70666
    7.0.0
  • `genPutArgSplit` on ARM can load of bounds #70051
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix corerun for assemblies with mismatched filename #70800
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix jump removal regression blocking jit_stress_splitting in runtime-jit-experimental #70797
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing the handling of Positive NaN in Math.Min for float/double #70795
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Don't use addressing modes for volatile loads for gc types #70794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: rework optCanonicalizeLoop #70792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update the version of dotnet used for Maui stuff from 6.0.3 to 6.0.4. #70788
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Revert "[wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol." #70787
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 warnings round II #70783
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Allow `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` on the LHS of block copies #70782
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on x86 #70779
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on Windows x64 #70777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix 42219 #70770
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Minor refactoring for `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzer` #70767
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Initialize Generation Aware Analysis later #70764
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [tests] Extend partial disablement of SkippingHiddenFiles (#65280) #70763
    area-System.IO

Merged

  • Find&replace FastInterlock* with Interlocked* #70784
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Upgrade SDK to Preview 5 #70117
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make ConnectWithRevocation_StapledOcsp more resilient to being slow #70413
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove GSS_KRB5_CRED_NO_CI_FLAGS_X code #70772
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Enable IlcTrimMetadata by default #70201
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update .net version for asp.net spmi collection script #70778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Faster long->int overflow checks #69865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable addressing modes for gc types #70749
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Predicate for valid Tracker Reference is inverted #70709
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Handle HW exceptions on Windows without redirection #70428
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enabling asynchronous thread suspension at GC safe points on ARM64 Windows #70769
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix race condition in LoaderAllocator::CompareExchangeValueInHandle #70765
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 round I #70417
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • NativeAOT Unlock assignability comparison in reflection-free #70726
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback on Android #70768
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Updating HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupId to not accelerate Vector256 APIs when AVX2 is unsupported #70686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Support `PUTARG_STK(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on ARM/64 #70256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Refactor how implicit byrefs are morphed #70243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle mis-sized structs in ARM/64 `PUTARG_SPLIT` codegen #70249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support `PUTARG_STK(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on x86/Unix x64 #70702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix value numbering of HWI loads #70621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not change `gtRetClsHnd` in `impNormStructVal` #70699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` on the RHS of block copies #70633
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Small MsQuicStream refactorings #70433
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [NativeAOT] Enabling return address hijacking on ARM64 Windows #70740
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add note about backward branch constraints to ECMA-335 augments #70760
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix Assembly.LoadFrom resolver #70537
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 6.0.7
  • Revert "Fix usage of GSS_KRB5_CRED_NO_CI_FLAGS_X" #70747
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix AttributePresence in composite mode #70737
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Harden for null byrefs #70317
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix default log color behavior when console is redirected #70504
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for cross module inlining and cross module generic compilation to Crossgen2 #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow child process reaping by other thread(library) #70705
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Unpin locals, attempt 2 #70655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Trying to remove a int to int cast in lowering #70756
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use crypto.subtle for HMAC on Browser WASM #70745
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add two new stages to prepare for our new custom type marshalling design. #70598
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix SpanHelpers.Reverse regression #70650
    area-System.Memory
  • Add event to capture min/max threads #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove workaround to get pauseOnExceptions setting #70748
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add icon to dotnet.exe on Windows #70578
    area-Host
  • Add limited support for LocalCertificateSelectionCallback for QUIC #70716
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm] Add support for per-project customization of helix work items #70461
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Make the archives created on Unix have the read permissions by default #70735
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Assertion prop fix #70643
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Narrow cast fix #70518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Convert fallback path of GetCommandLineArgs to managed #70608
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve TLS1.3 detection in registry for QUIC #70730
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Avoid infinite loop in case of heap corruption #70759
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • VM: Better strategy for TryReserveInitialMemory on arm64 (jump stubs) #70707
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix race condition between GCInfo and Rundown #70609
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • JSON contract customization #70435
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: Add `Order` and `OrderDescending` to `Enumerable` and `Queryable` #70525
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Removes abstract providers and mock from S.N.Quic #70421
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Relax Socket.EnableBroadcast getter exception behavior #70728
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Buffered reads #70148
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Bring up PPC64 little endian #70734
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, arch-ppc64le
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #70746
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Implement Vector128 version of System.Buffers.Text.Base64 DecodeFromUtf8 and EncodeToUtf8 #70654
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr, arch-ppc64le
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix ILGenerator maxstack computation #70388
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Rules for more aggressive reflection metadata removal #656

PullRequests

Created

  • Empty Assembly Functionality #1899

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net breaks when installing different SDK versions #26045
  • Net6.0-windows(Winform project) cannot be referenced by .NETCore-App,Version=6.0(Xunit project) #26043
  • Opt-in to FDD + (implicit) RID-specific apps #26031
  • Use implicit RID for `Publish` Properties #26028
  • Breaking change in response file parsing #26026

Closed

  • MSB6004 Missing "ProgramW6432" environment variable on 32-bit systems #25887
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #26047
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Force rebuilding R2R images if project files have been changed #26046
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26032
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix the path detection logic for MSDeploy executable #25995
    Area-WebSDK
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #26011
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #26016
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix copy&paste mistake in PublicSign preservation #25947
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move ILLink targets to the linker repo #25993
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the default to Release for Pack/Pub in command building #25991
    Area-NetSDK
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #26012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Define SystemCollectionsImmutableVersion Versions.props #26007
    Area-Infrastructure
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure
  • test install-scripts #23812
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS doesn't navigate to Source Link for Console.WriteLine #61942
  • IBraceCompletionService is ILanguageService, but its implementations are not exported via ExportLanguageService #61935
  • "Unnecessary Cast Analyzer" suggests to remove identity conversion on field of struct, which causes a change in behavior #61922
  • Incorrect nullability warnings for tuples #61918
  • Expression Evaluator Regression - Expression Evaluation in Watch seems to do not take usings into account #61914
  • Compiler crashes in EditAndContinueMethodDebugInformation.SerializeStateMachineStates #61913

Closed

  • Roslyn Produces Abnormally High CPU Utilization When Many Files Are Open #57525
    17.2
  • `[EditorBrowsable(EditorBrowsableState.Never)]` does not hide `System.Object` members from types in Nuget packages #61912
  • VS actively tries to override `Roslyn.sln` file after reinstalling #61828
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge CompletionServiceWithProviders into CompletionService #61943
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify implementation of the FindRefsCache helper type #61941
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #61937
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix post init trees parsing when parse options change #61934
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Add support for additional file diagnostics in workspace pull #61930
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Avoid accessing Document from formatter services #61928
    Area-IDE
  • NRT enable symbolfinder/find-refs code. #61921
    Area-IDE
  • Filter symbol first before creating InheritanceMargin target #61911
    Area-IDE
  • DRAFT: Use BackgroundWorkIndicator for FormatSelection #61910
    Area-IDE
  • Use BackgroundWorkIndicator for Rename Command Handler #61906
    Area-IDE
  • Add compliance pipeline for running APIScan #61905
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Actually return filtered items for default implementation #61938
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify lambda expressions #61929
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid NullReferenceException in Pick Members dialog #61931
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify FAR impl wrt searching for global namespaces #61933
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #61925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow resizing DetailedErrorInfoDialog #61932
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.4 #61936
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #61927
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61926
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.4 #61924
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61923
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61916
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add FixAll support of UseRecursivePattern refactoring #61915
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Let VS fix Compilers.sln #61886
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61908
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add dev17.4 to publishing config #61920
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update version for 17.4 branch #61919
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add FixAll support to ConvertIfToSwitch refactoring #61874
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61909
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61907
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61902
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61903
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61946
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #61945
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.4 #61944
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • SerializableOptionSet and IOptionService cleanup #61839
    Area-IDE
  • Add Document Outline Tool Window #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Classify pattern variables #59735
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [EnC] Allow deleting method #61806
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix invalid cast when removing unreachable code in top-level programs #61830
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Skip assignment nullability warning in error case #61895
    Area-Compilers
  • Bind switch expression with checked-aware binder #61890
    Area-Compilers
  • Editor config mapping #61899
    Area-IDE
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add FixAll in Solution support for Enable nullable refactoring #61879
    Area-Analyzers
  • Global options tests #61872
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unhandled exception in request still logs `Request finished ... 200` #42218
    7.0-preview7
  • Support custom graphics from Blazor components across all hosting models #42216
  • SVG links cause full page reload #42213
  • Allow consistent `Problem Details` generation #42212
    7.0-preview7
  • Make AspNetCoreGeneratedDocument namespace visible to intellisense #42211
  • Nullable `struct` not working with `AsParameter` #42210
  • Blazor WASM does not handle NullabilityInfoContext correctly #42209
  • W3CLogger Response Headers #42208
  • IDX10206: Unable to validate audience. The 'audiences' parameter is empty #42207
  • Virtualize should allow customization of the spacer element type #42206
  • Standalone Blazor WASM with Azure Static App causes net::ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #42203
  • add support for dynamic consents in RemoteAuthenticatorView #42202
  • cannot be packaged staticwebassets.pack.json not found #42200

Closed

  • Standalone Blazor WASM SEO elements PageTitle and HeadContent does not work for multiple pages #42205
  • Blazor - DXF JS viewer "three-dxf" not working - "There was an error applying batch 17" #42181
  • Admin -user registration using blazor server #42201
  • Project templates are creating an "http" profile even when auth options are selected that require https #42138
    7.0-preview6
  • [QUESTION] Blazor Server SignalR with Azure AD System.Text.Json.JsonReaderException: '<' is an invalid start of a value. LineNumber: 2 | BytePositionInLine: 0 #42159

PullRequests

Created

  • Support binding parameters to type Uri in Minimal Actions #42217
    community-contribution
  • Empty Blazor WebAssembly Project Template #42215
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Diff TestGroupName for project templates tests #42214
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Fix doc comment typo in WebApplicationBuilder #42219
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix http/https launch profile creation in project templates #42143
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview6
  • (Corrected) Generate Full Composite Images of .NET and ASP.NET Bundled Together #41855
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #42185
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.7

Updated

  • [Route Groups] Support AddFilter, WithOpenApi and other additive conventions #42195
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, feature-minimal-hosting
  • [WIP] Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime
  • [release/3.1] Redo `yarn install` #42173
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Fix up user-jwts interactions #42125
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts
  • catch JS exceptions when using InvokeAsync and throw them in .NET #41916
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add test for preload hosted services #37401
    area-runtime
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr
  • Generate VS.Redist package for ANCM #39140
    area-infrastructure
  • Faster ParseHeaders #39216
    area-runtime
  • [WIP] ANCM + Arm64 + helix #39420
    area-infrastructure
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime
  • test install-scripts #40061
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Compiler runtime APIs needed for bind:get, bind:set, bind:after #40143
    area-blazor
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Error when Hubs are registered as Singletons #40396
    area-signalr
  • Partition some pools by core #40476
    Perf, area-runtime
  • Skip dotnet-install #40551
    area-infrastructure
  • feat : Add `StringSyntax` for regex parameters #40589
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update CODEOWNERS #40664
    area-infrastructure
  • Normalize to arm64 in vcxproj #40697
    area-runtime
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adorner layer does not display anything for MAUI+WinUI #8096
  • MSB4018 The "GenerateShims" task failed unexpectedly on MauiCheck #8094
  • The "Xamarin.Android.Support.BuildTasks.VerifyVersionsTask" #8093
  • Visual Studio 2022 17.0.3 Preview 1.0 change color icons in Maui to black. #8092
  • .net MAUI debugging -> GetCurrentDirectory() points to C:\windows\system32 #8091
  • .net MAUI, Cannot create a log file in AppData/Roaming or AppData/Local #8090
  • Directory.CreateDirectory does not work in Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2022 (64-bit) - Preview Version 17.3.0 Preview 1.0 #8089
  • Platform Independent Solution for MAUI WebView Control #8085
  • Frame Property "IsVisible" not being properly displayed when changing Boolean value to true in backend C# when initialized False in XAML #8084
  • Backgroundcolor of Radiobutton is wrong in .net MAUI. #8083
  • Maui - No Capabilities Shown in Windows Manifest #8082
  • Maui Sample with errors NU1012 and NETSDK1139 #8081
  • Cannot create MAUI App Shell project #8080
  • MAUI Referencing .NET Standard 2.0 NUGet package throws System.BadImageFormatException when starting application #8079
  • When editing a MAUI csproj, VS auto inserts `AndroidResource` of the item that was changed #8078
  • MAUI "type or namespace name 'Application' could not be found" VS2022 Community 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #8077
  • .NET MAUI Templates not showing up - Windows 11, Visual Studio 2022 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #8076
  • [Maui]Not able to Debug MAUI apps when using Net6.0 Tizen #8075
  • MAUI.NET App: Infinite assertion failure in UIKit.UIApplication due to absolete code usage. (NSInternalInconsistencyException) #8074
  • Issue with OnPlatform in Maui #8073
  • Target platform identifier android not recognized (6.0.400-preview.22301.10) #8072
  • Android Button on template currently not resizing when text changes #8071
    6.0-sr2
  • Entry decoration on Android not correct. #8067
  • Pin target MAUI workload by using rollback file #8066
  • Pair to Mac fails on VS 2022 17.3.0 Preview 2.0 / 6.0.400 #8065
  • PushModalAsync on Android not working in latest Visual Studio Update #8062
  • ContentView does not respect IsClippedToBounds (does not clip children) #8050
  • Space in path causes ClassParse to fail #8049
  • XamlC should issue a warning when bindable property is marked as obsolete #8048
  • Pointer pressed not received in panel when using scroll view in windows #8046
  • IsVisible doesn't work anymore #8044
    6.0-sr2
  • Dynamically changing view in ContentView content shows empty page (Android) #8040
  • [Android] 1. ToPlatformException: CollectionViewHandler incompatible 2. Button width incorrect。 #8039
  • ANDROID Shell.Current.GoToAsync doesn't work if Shell.PresentationMode="ModalAnimated" #8038
  • Image with different format not working In IOS #8036
  • Debug start fails for Tizen App #8035
  • MAUI Dependencies cause issues when updating the MAUI workload with 3rd party dependencies #8032
  • Suggest: WidthRequest value can set to percentage, Can set only one border type in xaml #8031
  • MAUI Blazor Apps do not allow iframe videos to run full screen #8030

Closed

  • Updating WinUI properties via resources does not take effect #7820
    6.0-sr2
  • Entry background not accurate when changed with Triggers #5084
    6.0-sr2
  • Calling ClearValue if a color is null on WinUI is incorrect behavior #4356
    6.0-sr2
  • Unable to un-set values on Windows #7803
    6.0-sr2
  • Android app icons with just a single image (no ForegroundFile) do not render #7987
    6.0-sr2
  • Android app icons do not respect foreground scale and tint #7986
    6.0-sr2
  • SVG Icon display and scaling issues, platform dependent. #7629
    6.0-sr2
  • [Android] MauiIcon BaseSize and ForegroundScale doesn't work #7305
    6.0-sr2
  • Resizetizer does not respect splash screen alias #7990
    6.0-sr2
  • [Windows] MauiIcon Color and TintColor doesn't work in taskbar and is inconsistent elsewhere #7207
    6.0-sr2
  • SplashScreen does not regenerate after changing properties (Color/ForegroundScale) #7988
    6.0-sr2
  • No names for culture region #7948
  • No documentation for Maui-specific tags introduced in .csproj projects #7525
  • Unable to block popups in BlazorWebView #7930
    .NET 7
  • Slider Disabled style is inconsistent #7882
  • New MAUI project with la fair number of packages build for windows, but exits with "java.exe exited with code 1" #4895
    6.0-servicing
  • Border set in maui styles.xaml is ignored in a xaml page #7744
  • [Bug] Some input files use or override a deprecated API, Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details #3245
    6.0-servicing
  • [Bug] [Mac] Grouped collections views does not scroll vertically #2850
    6.0-servicing
  • Add Maui default global usings in SDK targets #1564
    6.0.300
  • OnPlatform Behaviors does not work #8042
  • XAML designer/previewer #6782
  • Text drawing has lot of bugs in android #8043
  • iOS Hot Restart feature not working after updating to VS2022 17.3 Preview 2 #8029
  • Build not working in MAUI Version 17.2.0 Preview 3.0 [32307.209.main] #5108
    6.0-servicing
  • ClockPage Refresh of current time clock is stop after some seconds or time #7978
  • “.NET MAUI gallery” not announced as heading. #6594
    6.0-servicing
  • Assinging SingleProject tag the value of false in csproj file does not have any effect #4029
  • Android in-app purchases: port Xamarin.Android.Google.BillingClient to Maui #3899
  • Build Windows target using `dotnet build` instead of `msbuild.exe` #3926
  • Add full LocalSettings implementation from UWP #3892
  • Add support for appsettings.json #3446
    Future
  • Failed to install maui-windows workload on ARM64 #3764
    .NET 7
  • Access controls inside DataTemplate #3675
  • How can i make MAUI Blazor Application rounded and WindowStyle None #3371
  • its Impossible to do more than one MAUI-Library Project into a Solution in VS2022 RC !! #3424
  • [Bug] <MauiImage> won't accept PNG file for Android AppIcon #2972
  • Xamarin Auth and .NET Maui with Facebook deprecation of embedded browsers #2791
  • [Feature ]Tag property Item on Buttons and other elements #2818
  • [Enhancement] x:Double's OnIdiom #2830
  • Check Xaml capabilities in maui #2148
  • Porting Blazor WASM to Blazor MAUI #2861
    Future
  • [Bug] Label text does not rendered correctly #1975
  • [Bug] TapGestures tapped event not trigged #1977
  • Error while trying to run WeatherTwentyOne on My Android phone and PC SDKs problem I guess #1981
  • Maps should be independent from the System Maps #8037
  • Pairing to Mac not working in Visual Studio 2022 1.17.3 Preview 2 #8026
  • Visual studio 2022 - 17.2.4 maui:/ #8027
  • Object.GetType returns Null #7401
  • string assignment is everytime null #7688
  • [IOS bug] string.Replace always returns null #7555
  • Android does not detect physical devices, emulators do not deploy #7477
  • rzc rewritecss exited with code -2147450730. #7955

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the correct define (NET6_0_OR_GREATER) #8086
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, 6.0-sr2

    area/infrastructure 🏗️

    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2

  • Automatically add MauiIcon to AndroidManifest.xml #8063

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8052

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to get column names of owned entity types #28241
  • Migration with comment #28239
  • Sum followed by a group by: "Cannot perform an aggregate function on an expression containing an aggregate or a subquery. " #28238
  • HasTrigger for entity-splitting #28237
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer.NetTopologySuite not working with .NET6.0 application #28235

Closed

  • How to store decimal.MaxValue or decimal.MinValue? #28240
  • Add additional error codes / handling in SqlServerTransientExceptionDetector #28200
  • If we group on an expression (e.g. a ternary), should the expression be re-used rather than further translated when selected in another expression (e.g. ternary)? #28219
    7.0.0
  • Putting this on the backlog for now. We would be interesting in hearing from any others who hit this issue. #28231

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace some 0x09 bytes with some 0x20 ones #28242

Merged

  • Update Resources.tt for VS2022 #28230
    auto-merge
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #28178
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #28177
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Json Columns initial work #28171
